record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, FEBRUARY 26, 2007 AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate today, and the Republican leader has no further remarks, I now ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the provisions of H. Con. Res. 67.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 3:27 p.m., adjourned until Monday, February 26, 2007, at 2 p.m.
